original_text:
O you who turn justice to wormwood
    and cast down righteousness to the earth!
korean_text: 정의를 쓴 쑥으로 바꾸며 공의를 땅에 던지는 자들아

sentences.original_text: O you who turn justice to wormwood
sentences.korean_translation: 아, 정의를 쑥 같게 만드는 너희는

sentences.original_text: and cast down righteousness to the earth!
